channel.title: 'linalg' Dialect on MLIR
channel.description: Recent content in 'linalg' Dialect on MLIR

item.title: Linalg OpDSL
item.description: Warning: Linalg’s OpDSL is currently being deprecated, with its operations slowly being moved into TableGen’s ODS format. Please refer to the MLIR Restructuring discussion for more in-depth information. Python based DSL for authoring Linalg op definitions and generating linalg.generic IR based on them for samples. The Linalg OpDSL is a high level DSL for constructing structured op definitions in a way that can be exported to built-in, named structured ops via YAML-based definitions or used interactively to emit corresponding linalg.
